description: Police said a group of men attacked a 31-year-old on the street in the Kensington area.
title: Seven arrested after man stabbed in street fight
title_page: Liverpool: Seven arrested after man stabbed in street fight - BBC News
maintext:
Seven people were arrested after a man was stabbed in the leg in a street fight.
Merseyside Police said a group attacked a 31-year-old man at the junction of Hold Road and Edge Lane in Kensington, Liverpool, just after 22:00 GMT on Thursday.
Three men, aged 29, 19 and 31, have been arrested on suspicion of assault and affray, and an 18-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of assault, affray and possession of a prohibited weapon in a public place.
An 18-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of Section 18 assault, and two men, aged 31 and 24, have been arrested on suspicion of affray.
